Mr. Martinez is out there.
translation.ja: マルティネスさんが来てる

translation.en: He would really like to speak with you, Amy.
translation.ja: あなたと話したいそうよ

translation.en: Go.
-You good? -Yeah, I got this.
[man 1] All right, so give me the story again.
[man 2] All right, let me see. Suspicious death of Mrs. Martinez, Ana.
translation.ja: アナ･マルティネスの 不審死だ アナ･マルティネスの 不審死だ ７週間後

translation.en: Presented to the emergency room with adverse reaction to amoxicillin.
translation.ja: アモキシシリンの副作用で 救急救命室に搬送された

translation.en: All right, so? Reacts to some antibiotic. What else?
They're not sure.
-They don't know what killed her? -No.
How old was she?
Seventy-seven.
Seventy-seven.
So why are we here?
[woman 1] The conference room's right this way.
[woman 2] Detectives, Braun, Baldwin, welcome.
translation.ja: ブラウン刑事 ボールドウィン刑事

translation.en: I'm Linda Garran, risk manager.
translation.ja: 危機管理責任者の ガランです

translation.en: This is Duncan Beattie, attorney. Our board.
translation.ja: 弁護士のビーティーと 理事も同席を

translation.en: You two might know Malcolm Burrel from the City Council.
translation.ja: マルコム･バレル市議は ご存じかと

translation.en: I am a huge supporter of the local force and the district attorney.
translation.ja: 警察と検事には 協力を惜しまない

translation.en: Ah, well, nice to meet you all.
translation.ja: どうも　それでは早速

translation.en: Okay, well, we don't know much.
Just that there's been a death.
An unexplainable incident in which the patient expired.
translation.ja: 原因不明の出来事により 亡くなった

translation.en: Okay. Unexplainable how?
Well, it's the opinion of the medical experts
that this was an unusual adverse reaction to medications.
translation.ja: 投薬に対する 異例の副作用が死因だと

translation.en: But we found absolutely nothing to suggest this was intentional.
translation.ja: ですが意図的な行為とは 考えられません

translation.en: Then why call us?
We didn't think this was a police matter,
translation.ja: 不要だと思いましたが

translation.en: but the Department of Health dictates when we should reach out, and here we are.
translation.ja: 保健局の指示で 通報することに

translation.en: What are the medications?
Um… Well, all are listed.
[Baldwin] Thanks.
It's quite a complicated document.
I'll take my chances.
Well, if you… if you turn to the third page,
you can see the window in which patient 1 had abnormal laboratory results and life-threatening symptoms.
translation.ja: “患者１”には数値異常と 命に関わる症状が見られた

translation.en: Where's Mrs. Martinez's body?
Uh, released to the family.
They put a lawsuit together?
We don't believe that the family are aware
of the unusual circumstances around patient 1's expiration.
translation.ja: 遺族は何も 認識していないかと

translation.en: Isn't that something you should've disclosed to them?
It was an evolving situation.
Parkfield rightly sought legal counsel to make sure everything was done correctly.
translation.ja: 病院側は適切に対処すべく 我々に助言を求めた

translation.en: Okay, but Mrs. Martinez's body is where? How do we get it?
translation.ja: それで マルティネスさんの遺体は？

translation.en: It's our understanding the family have cremated her.
translation.ja: 遺族が火葬したと聞きました

translation.en: When did she die?
Seven weeks ago.
We were conducting an internal investigation.
translation.ja: 内部調査を行ったので

translation.en: Hence the lag.
Okay.
Well, of course we'll need to interview all the staff that works in the ICU.
translation.ja: ＩＣＵ勤務の全職員に 話を聞きます

translation.en: Make way, make way. I am an important person of the town.
translation.ja: 道を空けろ　私は町の要人だ

translation.en: In fact, I am the most important person of the town,
translation.ja: いや この町で 一番重要な人物だ

translation.en: if not the most important person west of the Pecos.
translation.ja: ペコス西部で 一番ではないにしてもな

translation.en: [Charlie and Maya] "Wherever that is!"
I am the mayor of Humdrum Falls.
"So, what do you do?"
"Do"? I don't do anything. I'm the mayor.
translation.ja: 何もしない　町長だからな

translation.en: Okay. [chuckles]
"Well, you have to do something now."
"This may be just a one-horse town without the horse,
but it's been invaded by aliens."
I'll have to look it up in my book of How to be Mayor.
One. You get to wear a fancy chain.
translation.ja: その１ チェーンをまとう

translation.en: Two. You get driven around in a big car by your very own chauffeur.
translation.ja: その２ 運転手付きの 高級車を乗り回す

translation.en: Three…
You eat. It's…
"Three. You eat and drink for fr--" [grunts]
-I'm never gonna get this part! -Don't get frustrated, honey.
translation.ja: 役はもらえない 落ち着いて

translation.en: Are you kidding? This is great, Alex.
No, and the teacher said that I should wear a suit and have a mustache.
translation.ja: それに先生が スーツとヒゲが要るって

translation.en: Dress like a man because I'm the mayor. He said a girl mayor would be weird.
translation.ja: 女の町長は変だから 男の格好をしろって言うの

translation.en: Women can be mayors.
I told him that, but--
It's a play about an alien invasion, and the female mayor's the weird part?
translation.ja: 宇宙人が出てくるのに 女の町長が変？

translation.en: -Screw that guy. -[chuckles]
-[Jackie] I'm here! -[Amy] Hey!
-[Maya] Jackie! -No! You can't go yet.
-Oh, sorry, kiddo. -[Jackie] Come on, sweetheart.
-Come here. -[Jackie] Guess what I brought you.
Okay, take my hands.
Repeat after me.
I am the mayor of Humdrum Falls.
translation.ja: 私はハムドラムの町長

translation.en: I am the mayor of Humdrum Falls.
translation.ja: 私はハムドラムの町長

translation.en: I am the mayor of Humdrum Falls.
translation.ja: 私はハムドラムの町長

translation.en: I am the mayor of Humdrum Falls.
translation.ja: 私はハムドラムの町長

translation.en: -I am the mayor of Humdrum Falls. -I am the mayor of Humdrum Falls.
translation.ja: 私はハムドラムの町長 私はハムドラムの町長

translation.en: [both] I am the mayor of Humdrum Falls.
translation.ja: 私はハムドラムの町長

translation.en: [Charlie] You got this.
[Braun] Cream and two sugars.
They send over that internal investigation yet?
Oh, not yet. They say they need more time to compile all the relevant files.
translation.ja: まだだ　全て揃(そろ)えるのに 時間が必要だと

translation.en: Seven weeks wasn't enough of a head start?
You'd think.
You want me to
go through the staff?
Already did.
One of the nurses had a criminal trespass charge over in Pennsylvania.
translation.ja: ペンシルベニアで 不法侵入罪になった看護師が

translation.en: Oh yeah? A nurse?
Yeah, a male nurse. Charles Cullen. C-U-L-L-E-N.
translation.ja: 男の看護師だ チャールズ･カレン

translation.en: Huh. When?
Uh, eight years ago.
-What district was it in Pennsylvania? -Palmer.
translation.ja: どの地区だ？ パーマー

translation.en: -Palmer Police Department. -Hello, ma'am.
I'm Detective Braun with Homicide in the Prosecutor's Office in New Jersey.
translation.ja: ニュージャージー検事局 殺人課のブラウンだが

translation.en: I need some background on a guy you picked up there in '95. Could you pull the case jacket for me?
translation.ja: そちらで95年に逮捕した男の 記録を見てほしい

translation.en: -Do you have a name for me? -It's Charles Cullen.
translation.ja: 名前を チャールズ･カレン

translation.en: -Oh, there's a Post-it note on the file. -There's a Post-it note on the file.
translation.ja: ファイルに付箋(ふせん)が 付箋が付いてるらしい

translation.en: She's not sure if it's supposed to be there. Can you spell that?
translation.ja: 付箋が付いてるらしい 内容は？

translation.en: It says "digoxin."
Digoxin? What is that? A medicine or something?
translation.ja: ジゴキシン？　薬の名前か？

translation.en: Uh, you got anything else on him?
translation.ja: 他には？ 不法侵入と…

translation.en: Picked up for trespassing and…
Okay. Picked up for trespassing and harassment in '95.
translation.ja: なるほど 不法侵入と迷惑行為だ

translation.en: Says he slashed a coworker's tires after they broke up.
translation.ja: 破局した同僚のタイヤを 切ってる

translation.en: The charges were dropped.
-What's that? -Yep, all charges. Charges were dropped?
translation.ja: 何だって？　取り下げ？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Oh.
Okay, thanks so much.
-Yep. -Bye-bye.
Something's not right.
Parkfield waited almost two months to report it.
translation.ja: パークフィールドは ２カ月報告せず

translation.en: Internal investigation you don't wanna share. Expensive lawyers.
translation.ja: 調査資料をよこさず 一流弁護士を雇った

translation.en: Okay.
Well…
What possible reason could they have for covering up a death?
translation.ja: 病院は なぜ隠ぺいを？

translation.en: Right? What are the motives?
It's a business. There's never a better motivation than money
translation.ja: ビジネスだ カネに勝る動機はない

translation.en: when it comes to that shit, right?
translation.ja: カネに勝る動機はない

translation.en: Hello? You can keep eating.
translation.ja: 始めるけど どうぞ食べてて

translation.en: We won't take up too much of your time.
We just wanna make you aware of an event the hospital is looking into.
translation.ja: 実は現在 当院では ある件を調査中です

translation.en: We wanted to assure you all that the board and I
translation.ja: 理事会と私が中心となり

translation.en: are dealing with the incident and everything connected to it.
translation.ja: 詳細や経緯を調べています

translation.en: But we thought it best to bring you all together,
translation.ja: 皆さんに知ってほしいのは

translation.en: make everyone universally aware that the police are also involved.
translation.ja: 今回の件に警察も 関与してるという点です

translation.en: -And that-- -What is this about?
Uh, there's been an issue with a patient's death in the ICU.
translation.ja: あるＩＣＵ患者の 死について疑問点が

translation.en: Was the death suspicious? I mean, if the police are investigating…
translation.ja: 不審死だと？ 警察が捜査するなんて…

translation.en: I wanna be clear. We are investigating with the assistance of the local police.
translation.ja: 警察の助けを借り 我々が調査してる

translation.en: -Do you know which patient? -No.
translation.ja: どの患者だと？ さあ

translation.en: [Garran] But due to the fact that outside investigation is involved,
translation.ja: しかし外部の捜査が入るので

translation.en: uh, Mr. Beattie, our attorney, is here, and he would like to say something as well.
translation.ja: ビーティー顧問弁護士からも お伝えしたいことが

translation.en: Thanks.
Yes, uh, I just wanna say that I'll be discussing with each of you individually,
translation.ja: 今後 皆さんから 個別に話を聞きますが

translation.en: but as a blanket statement to all,
translation.ja: その前に明確にしておきたい

translation.en: I just wanna say that in times like this,
translation.ja: このような状況下では

translation.en: patient confidentiality has to be an absolute priority.
translation.ja: 守秘義務の履行が最優先です

translation.en: Your individual contracts are very precise when it comes to this.
translation.ja: 皆さんの契約書にも 明記されている

translation.en: Anyone speaking to the police without a representative of the hospital present
translation.ja: 病院代表者の同席なしに 警察と話した場合は

translation.en: would be in breach of their contract.
[clears throat] So at the end of the day, Mr. Beattie and I are here for you.
translation.ja: 皆さんの力になるのが 私たちの仕事です

translation.en: Uh, we wanna be present for any interviews, because we have your best interests at heart.
translation.ja: 警察の取り調べにも同席し 皆さんの利益を守ります

translation.en: You have full access, but she's gotta be in the room.
translation.ja: 取り調べには ガランが同席する

translation.en: No. Absolutely not. She can't be in there.
That lady's the risk manager. It's her job to be in there.
translation.ja: 危機管理責任者として当然だ

translation.en: Who's gonna talk if their boss is in the interview?
translation.ja: 上司の前で話すとでも？

translation.en: We don't even know what happened. We don't even have a body.
translation.ja: 遺体もないし 事件性があるとは限らない

translation.en: The only condition that they asked for is that she be in the room
translation.ja: 先方の要求は２つだけ 彼女の同席と 薬について聞かないことだ

translation.en: and that you don't talk specific about medications.
translation.ja: 彼女の同席と 薬について聞かないことだ

translation.en: I understand them asking for it, but why did you give it to them?
translation.ja: なぜ要求に応じたんですか

translation.en: You're supposed to be the prosecutor.
As far as I can see, they're cooperating fully with your investigation.
translation.ja: 病院側は全面的に協力してる

translation.en: This is all we have. Is this cooperation?
[prosecutor] They told me about that.
They're getting the documents together. It's done. They're sending it first thing.
translation.ja: 書類がまとまったから 至急 送るそうだ

translation.en: [Baldwin] Let me ask.
Why would Parkfield conduct an internal investigation, a seven-week internal investigation,
translation.ja: 何もないなら なぜ病院側は ７週間も内部調査を行い―

translation.en: then call us in and put her in the room if it was nothing?
translation.ja: 警察の取り調べに 責任者を同席させるんです？

translation.en: Due diligence.
I'm shutting it down. She's in the room.
translation.ja: 以上だ　彼女が同席する

translation.en: Done.
Hi, Amy.
Hi. [clears throat]
Nurse Loughren.
translation.ja: ロークレン看護師です

translation.en: -This is Officer Braun, Baldwin. -How you doin'?
translation.ja: ブラウン刑事と ボールドウィン刑事よ

translation.en: -What is this about? -[Garran] Just some informal questions.
translation.ja: 何です？ ＩＣＵのスタッフに 少し質問したいそうよ

translation.en: The officers are speaking to a number of staff in the ICU.
translation.ja: ＩＣＵのスタッフに 少し質問したいそうよ

translation.en: Do you remember Ana Martinez?
Yeah, Ana was my patient.
Do you recall anything odd about what happened to her?
translation.ja: 彼女のことで 何か奇妙な点は？

translation.en: Odd?
[Braun] Well, she died.
Yeah, and it was very sad. It was sudden.
translation.ja: ええ　突然のことで ショックだった

translation.en: Sudden?
Well, patients die in the ICU, but…
translation.ja: 患者の死は よくあるけど…

translation.en: we didn't expect it.
I don't mean to interrupt. Can I see you for a minute?
translation.ja: すみません 少し いいですか？

translation.en: Excuse me. I'll be right back.
translation.ja: 失礼　すぐ戻ります

translation.en: This better be important. I wanted no interruptions.
translation.ja: 呼ばないでと言ったはずよ

translation.en: You see any deviations there?
Mm-mm.
Wait, yeah. Her glucose. It's, uh…
translation.ja: 待って　グルコース値が…

translation.en: Yeah, the blood sugars, it's wrong.
Uh, there's no C-peps.
translation.ja: Ｃペプチドが 見られないなんて…

translation.en: -That's weird. -What does that mean?
translation.ja: Ｃペプチドが 見られないなんて… つまり？

translation.en: Uh, it means that the insulin in her system wasn't made in her body.
translation.ja: インスリンが 体内で作られてない

translation.en: Someone gave it to her.
So you can tell from that that she was given insulin?
translation.ja: 間違って投与されたと？

translation.en: Well, it's not on the list, and, you know, she's, uh… not diabetic,
translation.ja: リストにないし― 糖尿病でもないのに 投与された

translation.en: so the insulin would've been a double medication error,
translation.ja: 糖尿病でもないのに 投与された 二重の投薬ミスは 滅多(めった)に起きない

translation.en: which is really rare, so…
translation.ja: 二重の投薬ミスは 滅多(めった)に起きない

translation.en: A double medication error? It's rare?
Yeah.
-Would that have killed her? -Sure.
[Garran] Sorry.
-[door closes] -[Garran] Where were we?
Uh, let's see. Oh.
Can you tell us anything about your coworkers?
translation.ja: 同僚について話を聞きたい

translation.en: You don't mind if she answers a question about a colleague, do you, Ms. Garran?
translation.ja: 聞いても構いませんよね？

translation.en: -Of course not. -[Braun] Good
[Baldwin] We understand that you work with a Charlie Cullen.
translation.ja: チャーリー･カレンは 同僚ですね

translation.en: -[Amy] Yeah. -Could he be involved in this?
I think you're jumping to conclusions there, Officer.
Charlie wasn't there.
I mean, Ana died on the day shift. Charlie and I both work nights.
translation.ja: 夜勤だから 死亡時刻にいなかった

translation.en: We have no reasons to suspect it was anything other than an accident.
translation.ja: 事故以外の可能性は 考えられない

translation.en: Thank you, Amy.
I know Charlie really well.
We work every shift together, and he's a very good nurse.
translation.ja: 常に一緒だけど すごく優秀な看護師よ

translation.en: He wouldn't have made a mistake like that.
Thank you, Amy.
-So where's that internal investigation? -We're still reviewing everything.
translation.ja: 内部調査の資料は？ まだ見直しを

translation.en: Well, we don't need you to review it. We'll just take it as it is.
translation.ja: 必要ない そのまま渡してほしい

translation.en: I'll instruct the team to send you the boxes tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日 届くよう手配します

translation.en: But I hope you can deduce that, um… it's been a tough seven weeks.
translation.ja: ただ この７週間 大変だったことは― 分かってほしい

translation.en: Eight.
It's been eight weeks.
-[frantic beeping] -[doctor 1] Jack Ivins. July 19, '88.
translation.ja: 〝血圧急上昇〞 〝血圧急上昇〞 ジャック･アイビンス 88年７月19日生まれ

translation.en: Recovering from gallbladder surgery on Thursday. There was no complications.
translation.ja: 〝血圧急上昇〞 〝血圧急上昇〞 木曜に胆のう摘出術 合併症はなし 木曜に胆のう摘出術 合併症はなし

translation.en: [woman] Line in.
[doctor 2] Gonna need you to get ready to do another shock, 150 joules.
translation.ja: 再度 除細動器を 150にチャージ

translation.en: -Everybody clear. -[doctor 3] Clear.
[doctor 2] Deliver the shock. Shock.
Resume compressions.
[doctor 4] One and two and three and four and five and six…
-[doctor 2] Compressions. -Nine, ten, 11, 12, 13…
[doctor 2] Hold compressions. Let's check for a rhythm.
translation.ja: 圧迫中断　心拍を確認

translation.en: -[doctor 3] I got nothing. -[doctor 2] Persistent V-fib.
translation.ja: 変化なし 除細動を続ける　圧迫再開

translation.en: Resume compressions.
translation.ja: 除細動を続ける　圧迫再開

translation.en: Let's get one milligram of epinephrine IV started.
translation.ja: エピネフリン１ミリを 静脈注射

translation.en: [doctor 3] Six, seven, eight, nine, ten…
[doctor 2] Let's get prepared to give it another shock, 200 joules.
translation.ja: 除細動器の準備 200にチャージ

translation.en: [doctor 1] Epi ready. In line.
[doctor 2] Continue your breathing.
-[doctor 3] Twenty. -[doctor 1] Keep your compressions.
[doctor 3] Talk to me.
-[doctor 2] Is that epi ready? -[Amy groans]
Swap in, five, four, three, two…
-[gasping for breath] -[doctor 3] You're all clear.
-Oxygen's clear. -[defibrillation thumps]
[doctor 1] I'm moving in. Low pulse, low pulse.
translation.ja: 交代する　脈圧低下

translation.en: -Shit, no pressure, still. -[continuous beep droning]
[doctor 2] Four and five and six and seven
and eight and nine, ten, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15.
Shit.
Twenty-five. Now! Now!
[doctor 2, muffled] Let's go!
Take these.
[softly] You'll get fired.
So there's a fault in the PYXIS.
So if you cancel a request late enough, it opens anyway.
translation.ja: ギリギリに取り消した場合も 薬は出る

translation.en: That's stealing meds, Charlie.
Amy, stop. Now, please don't worry. I'm gonna help you get through this.
translation.ja: エイミー いいから 大丈夫だ　僕がついてる

translation.en: Hey, what did he say?
[Charlie] I think he's right. I think you probably do need to tell Alex,
translation.ja: 僕も アレックスに 話すべきだと思う

translation.en: just in case something happens and I'm not there.
translation.ja: 僕がいない時のためにね

translation.en: They don't have anyone but me. I can't leave them.
translation.ja: 他に家族はいない 置いていけない

translation.en: No, you're not leaving them, Amy.
translation.ja: そうはならない　大丈夫だ

translation.en: That's not happening. It's… What is it? Two months?
translation.ja: そうはならない　大丈夫だ あと２カ月だろ？

translation.en: Okay, so I'm gonna help you do this.
translation.ja: 君は手術を受けて 元気になる

translation.en: Get your surgery, be with your girls. That's what's happening.
translation.ja: 君は手術を受けて 元気になる 絶対にだ

translation.en: Okay?
But I think you should tell Alex.
[Amy] I know it sounds scary, but… it really isn't.
translation.ja: 別に怖いことじゃないのよ

translation.en: [Charlie] Everybody's hearts have these ventricles.
translation.ja: 心室は誰の心臓にもある

translation.en: -They're just these spaces. -Yeah.
They're two little spaces like balloons that fill with blood.
translation.ja: 血がたまった風船みたいで

translation.en: -They move the blood around the body. -Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: 体中に血を送り出してる

translation.en: And um… mine, they just, you know,
translation.ja: それで ママの心室は―

translation.en: they're too big, and they just got a little thin.
translation.ja: 大きすぎて 心臓の壁が… 薄くなっちゃったの

translation.en: But I am gonna be okay. I've got medication.
translation.ja: でも薬があるから大丈夫

translation.en: I have doctors taking care of me, and I'm gonna feel normal soon.
translation.ja: お医者さんもいるし すぐに治るからね

translation.en: But your mom's gonna need our help, Alex.
translation.ja: ママには僕たちの助けが要る

translation.en: If she were to fall or, um, you know, start speaking funny,
translation.ja: もしママが倒れたり おかしな話し方をしたり

translation.en: or you struggle to wake her or something,
translation.ja: なかなか起きなかったら―

translation.en: then you just… you put Maya in front of the TV, you call 911, and then you call me.

that I lied to you and went behind your back.
